posts.post_title: S-74 for sale or trade . Reduced prices.
posts.post_content:
I offered this group earlier in the week but wanted to relist and mention that I am willing to trade for any s-74 silks I need with either Old Mill or Turkey Red paper ad backs. If you have one I need I will make you a generous offer

For sale s-74 silks White sils with paper advertising Backs

Merkle Brown color ink Old Mill Back Gai 6.5 $165.00
Tannehill Rust color ink Old Mill Back Gai 5.5 $140.00
Murray rust color ink Old Mill Back ungrades vg + 75.00

S-74 silk colored 
Dygert Pink color with Turkey Red Advertising Gai NMMT 8 $235.00
this one looks flawless
